title: Most popular Canadian product categories purchased by consumers in Canada 2015
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 5 number of Responses.
Response Food has the highest Share of respondents and Wine has the lowest Share of respondents.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 53.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
Response Food has the highest Share of respondents and Wine has the lowest Share of respondents.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 5 number of Responses.
Response Food has the highest Share of respondents and Wine has the lowest Share of respondents.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 53.0.
max_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 87.0 is found at Response Food and the minimum is found at Wine where Response is 34.0.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 53.0.
The Response Food has the highest Share of respondents, followed by Beer, and Clothing. Down to the Response Wine which is the lowest.
Considered together, the average Share of respondents in all 5 Responses is roughly 50.0.
The Share of respondents is 250.0 if we add up values of all Responses.
